Key Match Events: Faisal Mansour Ali Saleh Al Badri converted a penalty in the 9th minute to give Libya an early lead.
Steve Mouine equalized for Benin Republic in the 50th minute, assisted by Junior Olaitan.
Junior Olaitan converted a penalty in the 62nd minute to give Benin Republic the lead.
Post-Match Reflections: This victory helped Benin Republic recover from their 1-0 loss to Nigeria and move into second place in Group D.
Libya, with a draw and a loss, now sit at the bottom of the group.
